review.comment: Rent back agreement was not honored after property was returned early (upon request).  The disputed "pro-rated" amount was only a few hundred dollars but their response was simply thank you for returning early but we will simply call the settlement even.  Do not trust this company with deposits or verbal agreements.  Make sure to have everything documented.
review.review_reply: We are known for our exceptional integrity and work ethics. We strive to be an impartial liaison between Landlords and Tenants so that both sides are mutually benefited and protected. We believe we did just that. We applied the remaining funds to pay the HOA fines, which were assessed to the Tenant, as well as recovered the cost of a light fixture removed from the premises by the Tenant. We thought this was explained and understood but we are very sorry your perception was different and left you with a negative experience.
Melissa, Thank you for your nice review!

review.comment: The LB Hunt team is just amazing! They gave our property a new lease on life which brought us tenants who actually stay and even care for the house. I wasn’t sure when a friend suggested hiring a company, but now I can’t help but recommend LB Hunt to anyone who asks.
review.review_reply: Amelia, we appreciate your review!  Thank you!  It has been really nice working with you too!

review.comment: He is a bad guy and his company is very bad.He cheated on me. Fukar  man.
review.review_reply: I'm sorry, I think this review was meant for some other company or person.  We are LB Hunt Management Group, an asset/property management company.  We are sorry you had a bad experience with this situation you are speaking about, but this is misdirected.

review.comment: We decided to work with LB Hunt when the neverending requests just became too much for us (my wife and I) to handle on our own. Holly assured us they’ll do the heavy work and keep us updated -- they have been true to their word and gave us more than what I expected. Highly recommend them for anyone who is up to their eyeballs in property requests.
review.review_reply: Stella, it's so great to see your review!  Thank you very much!  We are glad we met and exceeded your expectations!

review.comment: Who would want to leave a space that’s safe and comfortable? No one. And that’s why our tenant retention rate has gone up since bringing on Holly,Sondi and the rest of the LB team. Quality tenants appreciate quality management. And I appreciate them, too!
review.review_reply: Bram, thank you for leaving us this positive review!  We value our relationship with our tenants and glad you felt it.

review.comment: The folks at LB Hunt are very professional and take great care of the spaces they manage. I have felt they have dealt with me as a tenant in a very positive way.
review.review_reply: Jaren, Thank you for your 5 Star review!  We take pride in being the liaison between the Tenant and Owner and making it the best business relationship possible. We are happy it was a positive experience for you.  Thanks again!

review.comment: Our asset has been well-maintained, problems solved quickly and tenant Retention remains high. This company has been helping us with the redevelopment of the property and relocation of tenants. We couldn’t have done it without them.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much! We appreciated working with you.
Abby, Thank you for the 5 star review!

review.comment: They never answer their phone... ever. Don't believe me? Try calling them. This has been for over 2 weeks. I've left messages too. Find better management
review.review_reply: Susie, I'm so sorry you weren't able to get a hold of our office.  We noticed there are two listings for our company online.  One has the correct information and this listing does not have the correct information.  The number on this listing is not associated with our office.   Please call us at 801-322-2505 and we can visit with you regarding your needs.  Stay safe.

review.comment: LB Hunt Management Group has been so great to work with for the past three years. If there was ever an issue (hardly ever) or need, their team was quick to respond and follow through. My apartment was great and you could tell work had been done, and updates had been made, prior to moving in. Bottom line: they are professional and easy to work with. They helped make my move to, and time in, Salt Lake City a lot less stressful.
review.review_reply: Thanks Nathan!  Best of luck in your new home!

review.comment: I lived in a space operated by LB Hunt for almost 3 years. Holly always made sure to respond quickly to any issues/questions I had. The building was always well kept and I always felt safe as well which is very important since I was living in the heart of downtown. Thank you!
review.review_reply: Brittney!  Hope you are doing well and staying safe!
